EmailTemplate.name: Direct New Case Autoresponse
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for reaching out
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Thank you for contacting BigCommerce — we love email! We’ll get back to you as soon as possible. If you need immediate assistance during normal business hours, Monday-Friday 8:30am-5:30pm Central, please call us at 1-888-699-8911.
Thanks,
The BigCommerce Team
